nodes.text: Lotide was a planet in the Mortex sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

Lotide was a swampy world, and its main settlement and spaceport was Market City. During the Galactic Civil War, the planet was home to an Imperial Technical Branch Outpost used for weapons research and development. It was infiltrated by a group of Alliance to Restore the Republic agents working out of Fangol.
